input.t-att-checked: selected_property_type_ids and property_type.id in selected_property_type_ids or None

a.t-attf-class: dr-child-collapse dr-filter-btn ml-2 text-body #{has_any_child_selected and 'collapsed' or ''}

input.t-att-checked: selected_property_sublocation_ids and sub_location.id in selected_property_sublocation_ids or None

t.t-value: [sort for sort in properties_sort_by if sort[1] == request.params.get('order', 'published_date desc, create_date desc')]

a.t-attf-class: btn btn-primary-soft btn-sm mb-2 dr-add-to-favorite-btn #{has_favorite and 'disabled' or ''}

ul.class: list-inline d-flex flex-column flex-md-row align-items-center m-0 dr-property-card-icons-container

table.t-attf-class: dr-property-energy w-100 mx-auto #{'' if property.eec else 'dr-property-energy-disable'}

div.t-attf-class: energy-value energy-#{rating == 'A+' and 'Aplus' or rating} w-50
form-group form-field mb-4 #{'o_website_form_required_custom' if property_contact_field_phone.required else ''}
form-group form-field mb-4 #{'o_website_form_required_custom' if property_contact_field_company.required else ''}
form-group form-field mb-4 #{'o_website_form_required_custom' if property_contact_field_street.required else ''}
form-group form-field mb-4 #{'o_website_form_required_custom' if property_contact_field_street2.required else ''}
form-group form-field mb-4 #{'o_website_form_required_custom' if property_contact_field_city.required else ''}
form-group form-field mb-4 #{'o_website_form_required_custom' if property_contact_field_zip.required else ''}
form-group form-field mb-4 #{'o_website_form_required_custom' if property_contact_field_country.required else ''}
div.label: Country

div.t-attf-class: form-group form-field mb-4 #{'o_website_form_required_custom' if property_contact_field_state.required else ''}
div.label: State

label.h6: What can we help you with?
